title: TOMI: Transforming and Organizing Music Ideas for Multi-Track Compositions with Full-Song Structure
author: Qi He (Music X Lab, MBZUAI), Gus Xia (Music X Lab, MBZUAI), Ziyu Wang (Music X Lab, MBZUAI, New York University), ...
relevance_why: The system proposed integrates concept hierarchies in music generation, aligning closely with audio generation tasks. It offers a novel approach of multi-track composition that could enhance the realism and creativity in Haohe Liu's music generation projects.
background: The paper discusses an automated music generation system that organizes musical concepts hierarchically to create full-length electronic music compositions.
contribution: This paper introduces TOMI to model music concept hierarchy and develop a deep learning-based system for structured electronic music generation, achieving higher quality compositions with better structural coherence.

technical_comparison.prior_work: Previous methods in music generation often lacked a structured approach to capturing long-term musical elements.
technical_comparison.novelty: This work improves by employing a four-dimensional data structure for organizing clips, sections, tracks, and transformations, enhancing both the generation process and music quality.

key_innovation: The TOMI framework allows for dynamic, hierarchical structuring of music ideas, enabling more coherent and musically logical compositions.
real_world_impact: The integration with digital audio workstations like REAPER suggests potential for real-time human-AI collaboration in music production, enhancing the workflows of artists and producers.
limitations: The authors acknowledge challenges in maintaining harmonic coherence due to randomness during sample retrieval.

new_terms.TOMI: **Transforming and Organizing Music Ideas** refers to a framework for music generation that organizes musical ideas hierarchically, enhancing coherence and structure in compositions.

open_sourcing: Source code: https://github.com/heqi201255/TOMI. Demo page: https://tomi-2025.github.io/
